description: Enterprise techniques used by Stolen Pencil, ATT&CK group G0086 v1.0
name: Stolen Pencil (G0086)

techniques.comment: Stolen Pencil victims are prompted to install malicious Google Chrome extensions which gave the threat actor the ability to read data from any website accessed.
Stolen Pencil gathers credentials using Moafee and Procdump.
Stolen Pencil has used tools that are capable of obtaining credentials from saved mail.
Stolen Pencil has a tool to log keystrokes to %userprofile%\appdata\roaming\apach.{txt,log}.
Stolen Pencil has a tool to sniff the network for passwords.
Stolen Pencil has a tool to add a Windows admin account in order to allow them to ensure continued access via RDP.
Stolen Pencil utilized RDP for direct remote point-and-click access.
Stolen Pencil sent spearphishing emails containing links to domains controlled by the threat actor.
Stolen Pencil has a tool to add a Windows admin account in order to allow them to ensure continued access via RDP.
